Class ArrayPoly

  • java.lang.Object
    • ex06.AbstractPoly
      • ex06.ArrayPoly
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Poly

    public class ArrayPoly
extends AbstractPoly
implements Poly
    Class representing a polynomial with coefficients stored as on array of doubles
    Author:
    Nicola Bicocchi

      double coefficient(int degree)
      Returns the coefficient of the monomial with the specified degree
      int degree()
      Returns the degree of the polynomial
      Poly derivative()
      Returns an new polynomial which is the derivative of the current object More specifically, the call invoked on object (1), returns object (2) (1) c0 + c_1 * x + c_2 * x^2 + ...

        public Poly derivative()

        Returns an new polynomial which is the derivative of the current object More specifically, the call invoked on object (1), returns object (2) (1) c0 + c_1 * x + c_2 * x^2 + ... + c_n * x^n (2) c1 + 2c_2 * x + ... + nc_n * x^(n-1)
